name: Bigfoot: The Hidden Ghost
description:
Bigfoot – The most scary game and more terrifying!

The Bigfoot change their body color naturally and is about 6 feet tall.

The legend is that in the daytime the Bigfoot will most likely show up in open areas with trees to the side of an open, empty road, or in the woods or any area filled with trees.

Challenge is how long you can survive before Bigfoot gets you, with only your sharp brain and sharp brain!

FEATURES
- Easy pick up and play game-play
- Stunning graphics and silky smooth animation
- Excellent music and sounds
- Much more...
